content.rendered:
Directed by Radha Krishna Jagarlamudi.

Written by Radha Krishna Jagarlamudi.

Cast Nandamuri Balakrishna(Gautamiputra Satakarni). Hema Malini(Gautami Balashri). Shriya Saran(Vashishthi Devi). Kabir Bedi(Nahapana) . Tanikella Bharani(Devadattudu). David Blazejko(Assasian number 1). Snehith Chowdary(‘Vaasishteeputra’ Pulamavi). Milind Gunaji(Kanjira). David Manucharov(Demetrius).Harsha Krishna Murthy. Ravi Prakash(Gandaraya). Aarash Shah(The Spearman (Fighter)). Sunil Sharma(Dharmnandna). Sunil Sharma(Dharmnandna). Shivarajkumar(Kalahasteeshwara).Subhalekha Sudhakar. Bobby Gerrits(Soldier (uncredited))

Language Telugu.

Producers Saad Ajedigue. Harsh Dave. Saibabu Jagarlamudi. George Melikishvili. Sahil Mishra. Suhasini Panguluri. Y. Rajeev Reddy. Bibo Srinivas.

Production First Frame Entertainment. Sarke Studio.
